The two days, November 27 & 28, following Thanksgiving tend to be two of the busiest days of the year. But this year it was a bust.  The Maswik Lodge still has 35 rooms removed from service due to an ongoing construction project of new rooms.
Output: November: The North Rim closed for the year on November 26th due to a winter storm, and the Desert View Entrance station was closed on November 26, 27, and 28 also due to the storm. Maswik Lodge still has 35 rooms removed from service due to an ongoing construction project.
